thread.title: Come up with ideas; Mohammed tells public entities
thread.title_full: Come up with ideas; Mohammed tells public entities

title: Come up with ideas; Mohammed tells public entities
text: Share Vote Sheikh Mohammed urges 10 public entities to come up with three ideas In a new initiative to develop government work in Dubai His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice-President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai has called on public entities to come up with three ideas that could be implemented to place Dubai ahead of other cities by 10 years. The initiative called '10 X' , which stand for thinking outside the box, will be followed up annually be followed up by Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Crown Prince of Dubai, and Sheikh Maktoum bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Deputy ruler of Dubai. Sheikh Mohammed made the announced during the final day of the World Government Summit 2017 . Sherouk Zakaria
